question.text: The percentage proportion of homozygous parents in the <math><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></math> generation of a monohybrid cross is ______ the percentage proportion of homozygous parents in the <math><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></math> generation of a dihybrid cross

options.text: may be same or greater but never lesser than

solution.text: In a monohybrid cross, there are two homozygous parents out of total four offsprings. Thus their proportion is  50%. In a dihybrid cross, there are two homozygous parents out of total sixteen offsprings. Thus their proportion is 12.5%
